label: Policy Change
description: The company/organizationâ€™s practices concerning if and how users will be informed of changes to its privacy policy, including any choices offered to users.
usage:
Apply when the policy describes how users will be notified about changes to the privacy policy and what choices they have.

Key attributes to consider:
- Change Type (required): What changes trigger notifications - privacy-relevant changes, non-privacy changes, merger/acquisition
- Notification Type (required): How users are notified - no notification, general notice, personal notice
- User Choice (required): What options users have - none, opt-out, opt-in, user participation
